name: Create and send a PandaDoc document from a new row in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
Every time you add a new row to your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet, Make will create and send a PandaDoc document from a template and update the Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet.

You have to create a PandaDoc template beforehand with your own tokens. Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygQtSj2XF4pk_WMI1?e=EHqBVp).
